We are happy to introduce you to the most exciting design of the month, i.e. the multi-vendor eCommerce app. 


Like Amazon, we have developed an appealing design that gives a user easy navigation to the items in-store and improves customer engagement.

 

With white background color, the amazing UI/UX of the multi vendor eCommerce script gives an intuitive look and gives more stars to your mobile application. It's the easy way to bring your offline store to the online marketplace. 


What are your thoughts behind this design for an eCommerce app? Get in touch with us to understand the designing process in detail.
